channel.title: Should I buy a new xbox...?
channel.description: Now I let the people choose.... Vote and discuss if I should buy an xbox 360 slim today :D

item.title: Should I buy a new xbox...?
item.dc:creator: @neroxx neroxx
item.description:
@neroxx wrote:

[quote=“Daginith, post:56, topic:433823”][quote author=neroxx link=topic=536541.msg3937167#msg3937167 date=1331134260]

give me your old one…you can keep the new one?
[/quote] Umm… You want me to give you my old xbox for free?

Sell it on the GE ^_^[/quote] Yeh, Good idea! I’ll do that

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @neroxx neroxx

@neroxx wrote:

item.source: Should I buy a new xbox...?

item.title: Should I buy a new xbox...?
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

neroxx:

Did you have the 3 red rings (light) of death?

Yeah, when I first bought this for a tenner off a mate, fixed it in a couple of hours and had a fully working xbox

It was an overheating problem, I gave it a good clean out and applied new thermal paste to the CPU and GPU and it worked like a charm, always stays cool now

Read full topic
item.source: Should I buy a new xbox...?

item.source: Should I buy a new xbox...?

item.title: Should I buy a new xbox...?
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

It takes like 2 minutes, I’ve got mine opened at the moment just cleaning the disc drive

It may help, may not, it’s helpful to look up all the errors that can cause 3 red rings exactly, not 2, not 1, each number of rings corresponds to a different problem.

Read full topic
item.source: Should I buy a new xbox...?

item.title: Should I buy a new xbox...?
item.dc:creator: @neroxx neroxx
item.description:
@neroxx wrote:

Ok… I have tryed it now, I looked at the video, and I got my xbox almost opened done… But I gave up, cause I was like: “Uhh… How can it help to open the xbox to remove the red lights…” & I’m very sure that it dont overheat, because it has never been very warm… What should I do when (if) I open my xbox, and have opened… that much I can?

P.S: Man power didnt help… I needed to use something tiny to open it xD

Read full topic
item.source: Should I buy a new xbox...?

item.title: Should I buy a new xbox...?
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Them grey bits on the bottom and top will come off… use some man power.

http://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=disassemble+xbox+360&oq=disassemble+x&aq=0&aqi=g10&aql=&gs_sm=3&gs_upl=250l10585l0l12227l21l21l2l3l3l0l363l2084l0.3.5.1l9l0

item.title: Should I buy a new xbox...?
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“neroxx, post:37, topic:433823”][quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=536541.msg3931304#msg3931304 date=1330707851]
Open her up, take a look, might be just dusty as fuck and overheating.

Do the fans go crazy when you start it up? If so definitely a heat problem.
[/quote] I have opened it… But I dont get it really up… Ill make a video on tuesday or on Wednesday and show you what I do Maybe you see what I do wrong?[/quote]
Yeah go for it, should be able to diagnose the problem one way or another.

Read full topic

item.title: Should I buy a new xbox...?

item.description:
@Owner_Zack_of_Pwnage wrote:

I have my own Xbox 360 Slim, and honestly, it’s very cool. But still, if you want to buy something on the cheaper side just go with the original Xbox. And, if you really want to commit suicide, buy a PS3.

item.title: Should I buy a new xbox...?
item.dc:creator: @neroxx neroxx
item.description:
@neroxx wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:34, topic:433823”][quote author=neroxx link=topic=536541.msg3930202#msg3930202 date=1330611763]

I’ve had a regular Xbox 360 for 3 years and not had one single problem with it and still works fine to this day. Tbh don’t buy the slim unless your old Xbox is broken.
[/quote] My xbox is broken… anyways… The normal Xbox costs the same as a slim in Norway

How broken? There’s almost always a fix…[/quote] Red lights of dead… Look here: https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,536338.0.html You see… the red light :’( I dont really wanna give it to a shop so they can fix it…

Read full topic

[/quote] My xbox is broken… anyways… The normal Xbox costs the same as a slim in Norway :P[/quote]
How broken? There’s almost always a fix…
